      • selectFile

        public void selectFile(Context context,
                       boolean storeUponUpload,
                       UploadcareFileCallback callback)
        Select and upload file to Uploadcare from any social network.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the Activity that started file picker.
        callback - UploadcareFileCallback will be called to notify about result or error.
        storeUponUpload - is set true - store the file upon uploading. Requires “automatic file storing” setting to be enabled. is set false - do not store file upon uploading.

      • selectFile

        public void selectFile(Context context,
                       boolean storeUponUpload,
                       java.lang.String fileType,
                       UploadcareFileCallback callback)
        Select and upload specific file type to Uploadcare from any social network.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the Activity that started file picker.
        callback - UploadcareFileCallback will be called to notify about result or error.
        storeUponUpload - is set true - store the file upon uploading. Requires “automatic file storing” setting to be enabled. is set false - do not store file upon uploading.
        fileType - FileType

      • selectFileFrom

        public void selectFileFrom(Context context,
                           java.lang.String network,
                           boolean storeUponUpload,
                           UploadcareFileCallback callback)
        Select and upload file to Uploadcare from specified network.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the Activity that started file picker.
        network - SocialNetwork
        callback - UploadcareFileCallback will be called to notify about result or error.
        storeUponUpload - is set true - store the file upon uploading. Requires “automatic file storing” setting to be enabled. is set false - do not store file upon uploading.

      • selectFileFrom

        public void selectFileFrom(Context context,
                           java.lang.String network,
                           java.lang.String fileType,
                           boolean storeUponUpload,
                           UploadcareFileCallback callback)
        Select and upload specific file type to Uploadcare from specified network.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the Activity that started file picker.
        network - SocialNetwork
        callback - UploadcareFileCallback will be called to notify about result or error.
        storeUponUpload - is set true - store the file upon uploading. Requires “automatic file storing” setting to be enabled. is set false - do not store file upon uploading.
        fileType - FileType
